paper_abstract: Starting with some simple representative quantum programming languages, this paper lays stress on quantum computation, language paradigm, program structure, input/output, exception facility, and especially the recent results of the quantum computation group at Nanjing University, namely the functional quantum programming language NDQFP. All primitive functions and combining forms in NDQFP are given in the appendix.
paper_title: Quantum programming languages: A tentative study
